attributes.action: Change the nine-to-five to ten-to-four. Increases productivity and happiness!
attributes.background: Working 9-5pm (consider the travelling hours too), it makes it difficult to find a balance between work and personal life. Studies and experiments have shown not only that people are a lot more efficient and productive in a six-hour working day, but that they’re also more happy and less tired!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. 

The UK Government or Parliament doesn't set working hours. That is the responsiblity of employers. 

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to set a legal maximum number of hours that can legally be worked in a week if that is something you would like to see happen.
